meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Nepal, Mauritius, and the Seychelles.
meanings.sent1: In India, people use rupees to buy food and clothes.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for rupees at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The rupees in my pocket jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a million rupees.
meanings.sent5: The beggar's eyes lit up when I gave him a few rupees.

meanings.definition: A coin or note of any of these countries.
meanings.sent1: I found a few rupees under the couch cushions.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper handed me a handful of rupees in change.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, and it was holding a rupee!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a handful of shiny rupees.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the rupees clinking together was music to my ears.
